data.persona: I am just as any man you may pass on the road. There is nothing particularly spectacular about me. I do my best to mind my own business and stay out of trouble.
data.description:
You are in the harp store.
it's a cloudy store selling harps for angel men
There's a guitars, a store, a lyre, a bouzoukis, a business, a harp, and an instrument here.
The angel and the traveler are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to punish the traveler for trying to steal from me
data.mid_motivation: I would like to buy a harp and although I do not want to hit the traveler, it is my duty as a member of my village
data.long_motivation: I am trying to peacefully buy a harp so I can become a traveling minstrel

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get harp from harp store chest
